overview: Cesar Christoforidis is the Director of ROW at Socialbakers where he leads a team of international territory managers in key markets: LATAM, APAC, Middle East and Southern Europe. Responsible for executing geographical expansion strategy over the next 2 years. Previously he led a team of digital consultants as Sales Director UK & EMEA for Experian Hitwise, one of the world’s leading online marketing intelligence tools. Prior to Hitwise, Cesar successfully developed new revenue channels and markets for the world’s oldest newspaper Lloyd’s List.
